item.title: iOS开发之源码解析 - MBProgressHUD
item.description: MBProgressHUD 是一个为 APP 添加 HUD 窗口的第三方框架，使用起来极其简单方便，关于 MBProgressHUD 的使用方法，GitHub 上有详细的说明，这里就不多加介绍了，本文主要是从源码

item.title: iOS开发之源码解析 - Masonry
item.description: 这是 GitHub 上，Masonry 官方对 Masonry 的介绍： Masonry is a light-weight layout framework which wraps AutoLayout with a nicer syntax. Masonry has its own layout DSL which provides a chainable way of describing your NSLayoutConstraints which results in layout code that is more concise and readable. Masonry supports iOS and Mac OS X. 译文如下
